name: Stockbrokers
overview: Stockbrokers (Stock Market) is a game for 1 to 6 players in which you buy and sell shares in four mining companies. As in the real world, the price of these shares will fluctuate over a period of time; obviously you try to buy the shares when they are cheap and sell them when the price rises. The first person to make a million pounds wins! Published in the Stockbrokers 3-platform pak.
